1225730.name: DREAMLANDER
1225730.description:
Welcome to Dreamlander, an exploration RPG shooter where dreams and nightmares collide across a shifting reality!

Enter the dream and battle to restore order to a cursed land while trying not to lose your grip on reality. Meet a cast of unforgettable characters, including friends you'll hate to lose, and foes you'll love to hate.

Choose to maintain a soul of purity or strike deals along the way. Selling your soul may be the only way to save the ones you love.

// Note from the Creator

Hey, I’m Brad. :) Dreamlander is the passion project I've been working on for almost 10 years now. What started as an art experiment grew into an indie game inspired by some of my favorite retro classics. After nearly a decade of evolution, loss, and perseverance, I'm pretty psyched to finally be approaching a realistic release date. I'm aiming for a 2025 demo and a full release by 2026 or 2027. My only hope for Dreamlander is that it someday means to others what great games have always meant to me. Thanks for checking it out!
1225730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
